attributes.title: Just plain disappointed
attributes.review: This app not only charges you and is constantly playing videos over anything you try to read, but is completely bias and full of lies. Saying things like trump is for this country. It’s just plain disappointing and I was hoping to find some truth in here and maybe find a reason to vote for trump, get here I am. Clearly seeing that he is garbage

attributes.title: I was shocked 🇺🇸
attributes.review: On the app there were many misspelled words and I think even some made up ones. The app was slow and the color scheme was really bad. For some reason they kept advertising this weird orange spray tan and it would pop up every 30 seconds! Honestly I think I lost some brain cells on this app...like honestly. Please delete this app and rate it 1 star bc yikes it’s soooooo bad. SOME HOW It CRACKED MY PHONE AND REMOVED ALL OF MY SOCIAL MEDIA APPS!!!!!!!!!!!????

attributes.title: THIS APP IS A CURSE !!
attributes.review: So I'm a super big MAGA supporter, right?? Like I would do anything for trump to ***** *** **** ***** ** *****, but all of a sudden, right when I entered my phone #, MY PHONE SWALLOWED ME!!! It took me into a MAGA universe and had "all lives matter" written all over the skies. Then trump force organizations took my by the neck and paralyzed me from the waist down. I am now living in a wheelchair with three kids and currently homeless because it took all my money.

attributes.title: I’m so sorry
attributes.review: This app is such a great place it’s just that you have to be over 17 to use it which makes me angry because don’t ALL lives matter but I would like to let you all know that our Cheeto president is doing the best he can and I hope that the next time we see trump 2020 it’s in a grave stone because the man has had sooo much hate and he deserves a little break from all of it.

attributes.title: VIRUS ALERT
attributes.review: My innocence was stolen from me the day I got this app. I tried to sign up but then my phone shut of and after an hour it turned on again. I was baffled to see pornography all over my phone. I presume the app hacked my phone and gave it a virus . I have to get a knew phone because my phone keeps beeping and sending random threats .  I feel so scared knowing that this app knows where I live !

attributes.userName: BLM ACAB NO JUSTICE NO PEACE
attributes.title: Tik tok sent me, I provided
attributes.review: If I could give this no stars I would. Donald trump is a racist white supremacist that lies about his true intentions with communities such as the LBGTQ+. He has done terrible things to their community, the black community and (coming from someone who lives in Hawaii) the Hawaiian community by not doing anything to protect Mauna Kea and our native people. With my whole heart, I hope the simpsons prediction comes true. TRUMP 2020 🧚🏻✨on a gravestone✨🧚🏻

attributes.title: this app brought me severe trauma 💘
attributes.review: I had downloaded this app to support our immaculate orange cheeto trumpet 💪🏼, i wanted to see what the hype was about. after 2 days of having the app, strange things started occurring in my home 😱 i would hear strange noises, and i came to find out that it was coming from the app. this app smells like cheese 🤢 i will not be recommending this app to anyone. OUR homes will not be haunted by this piece of garbage 💘💟😱💓💔💖🤓.

attributes.title: Racist cheeto
attributes.review: I noticed ever since i installed this disgusting app I would wake up in the middle of the night from a dream that a racist Cheeto a was s the president I would scream and cry then fix myself up in the bathroom to see in the mirror a fat shriveled up cheeto like man I ran out as quickly as I could and locked the door behind me to delete that app now I have amazing dreams that make me cry of joy the cheeto was kicked out of office💕💕💕

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review: I am ashamed to have downloaded this app. I just wanted to support my favorite bunker boy president, but when I opened the app it was his only-fans! I am viscerally disgusted. I have seen many things that I wish I could unsee, and my wonderful president has now lost my approval. I am now going to bleach my eyeballs. Blindness is better than whatever you will see when you download this app.🧚✨
